About us

Dr. Pathak's Superspecialty Dental & Implant Clinic

Dr. Pathak's Superspecialty Dental & Implant Clinic was established in the year 2012. It has a team of specialists who provide specialised dental care.

Dr. Tushar Pathak & Dr. Mudita Pathak

The clinic is primarily run by Dr. Tushar Pathak [MDS(Periodontist & Oral Implantologist)] and Dr. Mudita Pathak(BDS) situated at Santoshi mata Road, Rambaug, Kalyan west.

Personalized and High-Quality Dental Care

We offer personalized, high-quality dental care for the whole family, utilizing cutting-edge equipment and advanced pain management.

Comprehensive Dental Treatments

We offer dental services like implants, painless root canals, smile design, whitening, oral and gum surgeries, cosmetic dentistry, Invisalign, and top-notch treatments, all at affordable rates.

TESTIMONIALS

Ajaykumar Pandey

I visited at Mr. Pathak sir's Dental clinic for the root canal of my teeth. Now, my teeth is very good and Mr. Pathak sir and madam are very good co-operative and experienced doctors.

Selvi Mudaliyar

Consulted Dr. Tushar Pathak for shaky tooth, advised bridging. Second opinion agreed, explained pros/cons. Procedure done in a month. Special thanks to Dr. Pathak, Dr. Mudita Pandey, and team.

Nayana Kapse

Excellent treatment. Got filling done at the hands of Dr. Mudita Pathak..It was done so beautifully. Highly recommended.

Shridhar Iyer

Dr. Tushar Pathak, a top Dental Super Specialist, performed painless root canal and replaced capping in one day on June 20. Multi-ceramic capping with ten-year validity installed.

Rani Kaur Jaswal

First review I've written, but Dr. Tushar deserves it. Great experience, comfortable implant surgery. Admire his loving approach to patients, awesome dentist and guide.

Shobha Poonja

Best service delivered by the expert dentist as currently no issues facing as far as my teeth are concerned. Most reliable and amiable dentist I have ever met.

Ranbir Saini

Had an amazing experience at Dr. Pathak's Dental Clinic. Highly recommend Dr. Tushar and Dr. Mudita. Got extractions and dentures, with relaxing music. Satisfying experience, great job doctors, you're a blessing.
